source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_00<tab>The bashful air ill suits a Roegadyn but Ahldfoet has it nevertheless, wearing the sheepishness like an incommodious singlet.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_00<tab>エールポートのアルドフートは、さらに冒険者へ頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_01<tab>Ahldfoet has promised a favor to a mother he met at a port of call, one whose entreaties seem to stir the poet in him. Take her letter to Wiltswys at Camp Skull Valley.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_01<tab>アルドフートから依頼を受けた。キャンプ・スカルバレーにいる「ウィルトスィス」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884901 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_02<tab>Expecting a heartwarming scene, you hand Wiltswys the letter from her mother. Alas, you are sent away with a flea in your ear instead. Ah, family matters.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_SEQ_02<tab>ウィルトスィスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884901 /var>を渡した。差出人は彼女の母だったようだ。手紙には、仕送りをしてほしいと書いてあったという……。
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_TODO_00<tab>ウィルトスィスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_000<tab>Ahoy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It clean slipped my mind the last time, but I've another thing to ask of ye. My bearings are lively on the water, but on land─well, I'm what you landlubbers call <var 1A 02 /var>at sea<var 1A 01 /var>. Got a letter that needs delivering and you're the <var 08 E905 ((maid)) ((man)) /var> for it.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_000お前さん、ひとつ頼まれてくれないかな？
オジサンは恥ずかしながら、陸の上は不案内でさ。
代わりに、届け物をしてほしいんだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_001<tab>I went ashore on some rock on the voyage in, and a faded petticoat comes up to me, says she got a daughter in Camp Skull Valley what she hadn't seen in years. Had tears in her eyes─pretty eyes too, for a woman past her childin' years. She must've been a real beauty in her day.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_001前に、オジサンが名前もなき島へ寄港したとき、
ある人から、愛娘に渡してくれと託されたものがあるんだ。
涙ながらにね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_002<tab>Always had a soft spot for tawny eyes...mayhap because the sea is a green-eyed virago and the skies, her sisters, have eyes blue and red, grey and black... Well, this daughter of hers goes by Wiltswys. You'll take the letter to her?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_AHLDFOET_000_002「ウィルトスィス」って子への手紙だよ。
彼女は「キャンプ・スカルバレー」で働いてるらしい。
人助けだと思って頼むぜ、なぁオイ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_010<tab>Greetings, adventurer. They said you were looking for me?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_010あら、冒険者さん？
私に何か御用かしら？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_011<tab>A letter from Mama! I haven't heard from her in so long... She never answered my letters. No, stay, for I'll have a reply to send!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_011……これは、ママンからのお手紙！
あ、ありがとうございました……さっそく読んでみます！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_012<tab>What the...! Oh, the stone-hearted, grasping hag! Wouldn't let me take so much as a hunk of dried fish when I left the island, and now she wants gil? That...that <var 1A 02 /var>succubus<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_012……………………。
…………仕送りをしろですって？
たまに手紙をよこせばこれなの！？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_013<tab>You think me cold? Well, fie on what you think! I wanted something better than tilling salty fields and spilling small fry out the nets, and occasionally taking a passing sailor into my bed for more o' the same! She'll receive no reply from me. Thank you for your service, and good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA155_01146_WILTSWYS_000_013はぁ、何もかも、貧乏が悪いの？
まったく、心がすさむわ……。
いっそのこと、縁切っちゃおうかしら。
